articles.title: Apples iPhone SE (2020) shines in our review with many small improvements - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: A new iPhone for less than $500? Currently, only the iPhone SE (2020) makes this possible. This sounds like a good deal and while the smartphone offers many contempory features, it lacks a modern design.
